name: How to Hire a Virtual Assistant with Ocean VA
description: Step-by-step guide to hiring a virtual assistant through Ocean Virtual Assistant

step.name: Schedule a Discovery Call
step.description: Book a free discovery call with our team to discuss your business needs, goals, and the type of virtual assistant that would be the best fit.

step.name: Receive Candidate Shortlist
step.description: We vet the top 1% of applicants and provide you with a curated shortlist of qualified candidates who match your requirements.

step.name: Conduct Interviews
step.description: Interview your top candidates and select the virtual assistant who best fits your team and business culture.

step.name: Onboarding & Setup
step.description: We handle the onboarding process, including access setup, SOP documentation, and initial training on your systems and workflows.

step.name: Go Live & Start Getting Results
step.description: Your dedicated VA is ready to work. Ongoing support and quality assurance ensure continued success.
